opendb_id.description: Unique identifier for the document (UUID v4)

form_factor.description: The form factor of the case (e.g., ATX Mid Tower, Full Tower, Mini-ITX)

color.description: The color of this product (e.g., ['Black', 'Red']). Each color of the product should be included in the array.

power_supply.description: If included with the case, could detail the PSU model

power_supply_included.description: Whether the case includes a power supply

supported_power_supply_form_factors.description: The PSU form factors that the case can support (e.g., ['ATX', 'SFX', 'SFX-L'])

side_panel.description: The type of side panel (e.g., Tempered Glass, Acrylic, Solid)

has_transparent_side_panel.description: Whether the case has a transparent side panel

front_panel_usb.description: DEPRECATED: Use front_usb_ports instead. Description of front panel USB ports (e.g., 'USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C, USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A')

front_usb_ports.description: Array of front panel USB port types (e.g., ['USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C', 'USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A', 'USB 2.0'])

max_video_card_length.description: The maximum supported video card length in mm

max_cpu_cooler_height.description: The maximum supported CPU cooler height in mm

internal_3_5_bays.description: The number of internal 3.5" drive bays

internal_2_5_bays.description: The number of internal 2.5" drive bays

external_3_5_bays.description: The number of external 3.5" drive bays

external_5_25_bays.description: The number of external 5.25" drive bays

power_supply_shroud.description: Whether the case has a power supply shroud

riser_expansion_slots.description: The number of riser expansion slots

supports_rear_connecting_motherboard.description: Whether the case supports rear connecting motherboard (BTF, Project Zero, etc)

dimensions.description: The dimensions of the case in mm (e.g., '466 x 290 x 495')

dimensions_mm.description: The dimensions of the case in mm (e.g., { width: 466, height: 290, depth: 495 })

volume.description: The internal volume of the case in liters

general_product_information.description: General product information and retailer SKUs
